Description: Set definition, eg [a-z] matches all lowercase characters;  [aAbB1234] matches an a, A, b, B or numbers 1, 2 ,3, 4
column3: [aAbB1234] matches an a, A, b, B or numbers 1, 2 ,3, 4

Description: Negated set definition, eg [^a-z] matches anything BUT lowercase characters
Matches X or Z (either one will suffice)
Anchors regex at beginning of line
Anchors regex at end of line
Any whitespace character;  any non-whitespace character
A word character, short for [a-zA-Z_0-9];  same but negated
